name: rdkit-testing
description: JavaScript distribution of cheminformatics functionality from the RDKit - a C++ library for cheminformatics.

scripts.react:build: npm run react:pre && cd examples/react-example && npm run build
scripts.react:start: npm run react:pre && cd examples/react-example && npm run start
scripts.resetVersion: jq '.version = "PLACEHOLDER"' package.json > temp && mv temp package.json
scripts.test: echo "Tests are run during the docker build. See https://github.com/rdkit/rdkit/blob/master/docker/Dockerfile ." && exit 1

author: Greg Landrum and the RDKit contributors
